Title: Preparing for a Repair Conversation
Overall Purpose: To equip individuals with the tools and mindset necessary to engage in conversations that mend and strengthen relationships, fostering understanding and resolution.
Why This Matters: Without preparation, repair conversations can escalate conflicts, deepen misunderstandings, and damage trust. Thoughtful preparation ensures a constructive dialogue that heals and builds stronger connections.
When To Use This Protocol: Use when a relationship has experienced tension or conflict, when misunderstandings have occurred, or when trust needs rebuilding.

Overall Outcomes.Poor: You enter the conversation unprepared and defensive → The future sees further erosion of trust and unresolved tensions.
Overall Outcomes.Expected: You prepare somewhat but miss key aspects → The future holds partial resolution but lingering issues.
Overall Outcomes.Excellent: You prepare thoroughly, considering all perspectives → The future enjoys restored trust and strengthened bonds.
Overall Outcomes.Transcendent: Preparation becomes a natural part of your relational practice → The future thrives on deepened understanding and resilience.

Themes.Name: Understanding the Root Cause
Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To identify and comprehend the underlying issues that led to the conflict.
Themes.Why This Matters: Addressing surface symptoms without understanding root causes leads to temporary fixes rather than lasting solutions.

Poor.Future effect: The future inherits unresolved tensions and trust erosion.

Expected.Example moves: Identifying patterns but not their origins.
Expected.Future effect: The future holds partial resolution but lingering issues.

Excellent.Present pattern: You delve into root causes with curiosity.
Excellent.Example moves: Engaging in reflective dialogue to uncover causes.
Excellent.Future effect: The future enjoys restored trust and strengthened bonds.

Transcendent.Present pattern: Root cause analysis is second nature.
Transcendent.Example moves: Embedding root cause exploration in all interactions.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on deepened understanding and resilience.

Guiding Questions: What underlying issues might be driving this conflict?
How have similar issues been resolved in the past?

Themes.Name: Setting Intentions and Boundaries
Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To clarify your goals and establish healthy boundaries for the conversation.
Themes.Why This Matters: Clear intentions and boundaries prevent conversations from derailing and ensure mutual respect.

Poor.Edge condition: Mistaking flexibility for lack of direction.
Poor.Example moves: Engaging without a plan or limits.
Poor.Future effect: The future suffers from misalignment and conflict.

Expected.Present pattern: You set some intentions but lack clarity.
Expected.Future effect: The future holds partial resolution but lingering issues.

Excellent.Present pattern: You clearly define intentions and boundaries.
Excellent.Future effect: The future enjoys restored trust and strengthened bonds.

Transcendent.Present pattern: Intentions and boundaries are naturally integrated.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on deepened understanding and resilience.

Guiding Questions: What do I hope to achieve in this conversation?
What boundaries are necessary for a healthy dialogue?
How can I communicate my intentions clearly?

Themes.Name: Cultivating Empathy and Openness
Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To approach the conversation with a mindset of understanding and receptivity.
Themes.Why This Matters: Empathy and openness create a safe space for honest dialogue and mutual growth.

Poor.Future effect: The future suffers from misalignment and conflict.

Expected.Present pattern: You show some empathy but remain guarded.
Expected.Future effect: The future holds partial resolution but lingering issues.

Excellent.Present pattern: You engage with empathy and openness.
Excellent.Future effect: The future enjoys restored trust and strengthened bonds.

Transcendent.Present pattern: Empathy and openness are ingrained habits.
Transcendent.Example moves: Embedding empathy training in team development.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on deepened understanding and resilience.

Guiding Questions: How can I better understand their perspective?
What assumptions might I need to challenge?
How can I remain open to unexpected insights?

Themes.Name: Preparing for Emotional Regulation
Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To manage emotions effectively during the conversation.
Themes.Why This Matters: Emotional regulation prevents escalation and keeps the conversation productive.

Poor.Future effect: The future suffers from misalignment and conflict.

Expected.Present pattern: You attempt to regulate emotions with mixed success.
Expected.30-90 day system effect: Some emotional control, but volatility persists.
Expected.Future effect: The future holds partial resolution but lingering issues.

Excellent.Present pattern: You manage emotions with skill and awareness.
Excellent.Future effect: The future enjoys restored trust and strengthened bonds.

Transcendent.Present pattern: Emotional regulation is a natural strength.
Transcendent.Example moves: Embedding emotional intelligence in team culture.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on deepened understanding and resilience.

Guiding Questions: What emotions might arise during this conversation?
How can I prepare to manage them effectively?
What strategies help me stay calm and focused?

Themes.Name: Crafting a Collaborative Approach
Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To engage the other party as a partner in finding solutions.
Themes.Why This Matters: Collaboration fosters mutual respect and shared ownership of outcomes.

Poor.Present pattern: You approach as adversaries rather than partners.
Poor.30-90 day system effect: Increased division and lack of resolution.
Poor.Signals: Frequent power struggles, lack of compromise.
Poor.Example moves: Insisting on your perspective without listening.
Poor.Future effect: The future suffers from misalignment and conflict.

Expected.Present pattern: You attempt collaboration with varying success.
Expected.Example moves: Proposing solutions but not fully engaging others.
Expected.Future effect: The future holds partial resolution but lingering issues.

Excellent.Edge condition: Balancing collaboration with clarity of goals.
Excellent.Future effect: The future enjoys restored trust and strengthened bonds.

Transcendent.Example moves: Embedding collaborative practices in team norms.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on deepened understanding and resilience.

Guiding Questions: How can we approach this as partners?
What shared goals can guide our conversation?
How can I invite collaboration without losing focus?

Completion Prompts: Identify one relationship that could benefit from a repair conversation this week.
Reflect on a past conflict: How could preparation have changed the outcome?
Choose one theme to focus on in your next repair conversation.
